title: Untrusted (Steam) Giveaway
description: Grab Untrusted for free on Steam! Untrusted is an online multiplayer social deduction game where you take on the role of a hacker. Don´t miss it!
instructions:

2. Download this game directly via Steam before the offer expires.
3. That´s it! Have fun!

title: DK Online: Season 4 First Steps Pack (Steam) Giveaway

title: DungeonLoot: Open Beta Has Arrived!
description: The GamerPower team is on a quest to bring more loot to gamers, so we created DungeonLoot. The idea is something like Amazon Prime Gaming, but completely free. No subscriptions or costs, just a place where you can claim gaming loot anytime. Our goal? To make DungeonLoot the ultimate place for gaming giveaways.
instructions: 1. Click the button to visit DungeonLoot. 2. Simply create an account. 3. Select your favorite giveaway and grab the loot. It's that easy!
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: DAVE THE DIVER - Godzilla Content Pack (Steam) Giveaway
description: Grab your free Godzilla DLC for DAVE THE DIVER on Steam! DAVE THE DIVER - Godzilla Content Pack is a time-limited free DLC, only available until December 31, 2026. Please note the base game DAVE THE DIVER is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download this DLC directly via Steam before the offer expires.
3. Don´t forget to install the base game.

title: 3on3 FreeStyle: Beginner's Starter Kit (Steam) Giveaway
description: Claim your 3on3 FreeStyle - Beginner's Starter Kit for free via Steam and get started with confidence! Each starter kit is packed with essential in-game items to boost your early progress!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download this pack directly via Steam before expires.
3. Please note the base game via Steam is required to enjoy this content.

title: EVERSPACE 2 Decal DLC Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Steam key and unlock the "Alienware decal" for your ships in EVERSPACE 2! Please note the base game EVERSPACE 2 on Steam is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Zero King (Beta) Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Zero King Beta Steam Key and join the beta test today! Plus by joining this beta, you'll have a chance to unlock a limited edition ship! Zero King is a free-to-play post-apocalyptic, 4v4 King of the Hill style online PvP battle arenas. Check it out!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Exoprimal: Alienware Decal Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Exoprimal: Alienware Decal Steam Key and customize your exosuit! Please note the base game Exoprimal is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:

2. Click the button to unlock your free Steam key.
3. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
4. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Age of Wonders 4: Special Godir Helmet Steam Key Giveaway

instructions:

2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Thunder League Online: Free Points Key Giveaway
description: Grab a free Thunder League Online bundle of 1,000 Thunder Points (in-game currency). Thunder Points can be used to purchase anything from the in-game shop!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:
Claim your Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code for free! Find the code below and follow the instructions to redeem your Emblem code.

CODE: ML3-FD4-ND9
instructions:
1. Navigate to the Destiny 2 code redemption page (click on the "Get Loot" button).
2. Choose your platform, sign in to your platform account, then just add your code and redeem it.

title: Payday 2: Free In-game Items Giveaway
